sentence.Network_en: Faculty members devote most of their time to scholarly research.
sentence.Network_cn: 全院教师大部分时间都用来从事学术研究。

sentence.Network_en: My object was to publish a scholarly work on Peter Mourne.
sentence.Network_cn: 我的目标是出版一本关于彼得·莫恩的学术著作。

sentence.Network_en: This has been the subject of intense scholarly debate.
sentence.Network_cn: 这一直是学术讨论的热门话题。

entry.def: A scholarly person spends a lot of time studying and knows a lot about academic subjects.

example.ex: He was an intellectual, scholarly man.

entry.def: A scholarly book or article contains a lot of academic information and is intended for academic readers.

example.tran: 学术性较强的学术期刊

entry.tran: (问题、活动)学术的，学术性的,学术界的
entry.def: Scholarly matters and activities involve people who do academic research.

example.ex: This has been the subject of intense scholarly debate...
example.tran: 这一直是学术讨论的热门话题。

example.ex: Faculty members devote most of their time to scholarly research.
example.tran: 全院教师大部分时间都用来从事学术研究。

auth_sentence.content: How many scholarly papers on curling have you published?
auth_sentence.res_content: How many scholarly papers on curling have you published?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: How many scholarly papers on curling have you published?

auth_sentence.content: I would be thankful for a different scholarly explanation.
auth_sentence.res_content: I would be thankful for a different scholarly explanation.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I would be thankful for a different scholarly explanation.

auth_sentence.content: A...scholarly man, living alone with his books.
auth_sentence.res_content: A...scholarly man, living alone with his books.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: A...scholarly man, living alone with his books.

Sentence.sentence: The publisher, fearful of being cheated, forced her to submit to his scholarly examination by a board of educated men, including the colonial governor.

sentences.en: The scholarly monographs were published as pamphlet.
sentences.cn: 学术专著是以小册子形式出版的。

sentences.en: He has gained a distinction in various fields of scholarly studies.
sentences.cn: 他在多种科学的学术研究中享有盛名。

sentences.en: The schoolmaster was a scholarly man. All his pupils looked up to him.
sentences.cn: 校长是个很有学问的人,他的学生都尊重他。

sentences.en: She was a scholarly woman who had specialized in Italian literature at university.
sentences.cn: 她是个学问精深的女人, 她在大学里读的专业是意大利文学。
